page.title: 16Priestley's Farm.
page.content: The farm has all sorts of animals and this includes the following: horses,pigs,cows,hens,geese,dogs,a donkey and some goldfish in a well. The Priestley's have been there for almost eight years and paid out for the farm because they loved animals.The first thing they did was to build a new house. The family do not employ anyone to help run the farm as it is a family concern.The farm does not grow crops of any description and depend on the animals. Furthermore,the family has built 12 stables and the children enter horses in shows.Henry Priestley told us that there used to be a farm here 200 years ago and that it was farmed alot during the last war. Interview by Karen Lisa Adele.
